name: Death Wizard Alpha Build
description:
This is a very early version of a game I plan to eventually develop into a full product. Any feedback is appreciated!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GAME DETAILS

Controls

Arrow keys to move

Tab: opens Spells menu

Esc: exit out of casting a spell

How to play

Every time you die you pick a bonus based on what killed you. You will keep this Gift of Undeath until you win or loose the game. However, every time you die you also loose some of your maximum health. If you die 10 times you loose the game.

You can buy Spells with Spell Points. All enemies have a chance to drop spell points when they are defeated . On death you will loose all your spells, buy you can also use Spell Points to buy Undying Knowledge, which will provide a bonus until you win or loose the game.

Good Luck! - John
